name: Tunnel Jumper
description:
Drag your finger to control the hungry monster that seeks to eat everything thing in its path. Be careful though, the monster is allergic to bombs.

Can you set the highest score among your friends? It's not as easy as it looks!

One mistake and you die! Simple as that!

Features:
- Single tap and drag to play
- No Ads
- Free to Play
- Challenge your friends
